FuncDef:
The tunnel hello peer-check command configures to send Hello packets after a Hello interval from when it receives Hello packets from the peer end.
The undo tunnel hello peer-check command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device sends Hello packets to the peer end at intervals, irrespective whether it receives Hello packets from the peer end.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow the device to send Hello packets after it receives Hello packets from a non-Huawei device, run the tunnel hello peer-check command.
Configuration Impact
By default, the device sends Hello packets to the peer end at intervals on an L2TP tunnel, irrespective whether it receives Hello packets from the peer end. After the tunnel hello peer-check command is run, the device sends Hello packets after a Hello interval from when it receives Hello packets from the peer end.
